participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Introverted and imaginative, often lost in worlds created by games.
participant_1.background: i have an internet addiction and spend a lot of time playing roleplaying games. i faint at the sight of blood. my dream in life is to work from home. i went to school to be a veterinarian but hated it.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and passionate about music and languages, loves to share knowledge.
participant_2.background: one of the languages that i am currently studying is spanish. i am a musician. i also study languages. my favorite spanish word is trabajo. my next language to study is french.
